类型: Color: A-black+brown+beigeSize: XXXL: Fit Waist Size 51-54 Inches
评论详情: The quality of these belts was apparent. They are good looking and appear to be made of quality materials. The colors are nice and likely to match to a variety of wardrobe choices. However - the sizes are overestimated. These are way too long and therefore were returned. So buyer beware, you may need to order down a size for these to work for you. The buckle is a shiny gold and appeared to be quality. One could dress these belts up or down and this buckle wouldn’t look out of place in either case.  These belts arrive coiled together in a plastic bag and with a hole punch for those desire to modify the belts from their standard configuration.

评论详情: Finally, decent belts that won’t break the bank, and all in colors I’ve been looking for! These came in quickly, were packaged nicely, and fit just fine! I appreciate the hole tool to have just in case, but I don’t think I will need it.  The quality of the belts seems good and like they should hold up long enough. The width of the belts is just right, and the buckle style looks very nice - they look like they would cost more than they do! I am grateful to have found these, especially after almost buying just one belt in the tan color I needed that was going to cost me over $30. Just try them if you’re hesitant.
